name: Save The Forest (itch) (Mj Sirius Industries)
description:
Fight endless waves of enemies before they destroy the forest !

Aim at the trucks and space bar to destroy them, or click on bonuses to heal the trees, spawn magic trees, invoke Gaïa's Wrath and more !

How long will the forest last ?

2 difficulties + one extra mode starting with a single tree. Hopefully much harder but I'm not sure.

Leaderboard is currently broken but should be able to display the top 10 players soon.

CREDITS :

3D models by Synty Studios,

Mischievous SDF Font from dafont.com

Audio :

- Vehicles Essentials, by NOX SOUND https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/transportation/vehicle-esse...

- Nature Essentials, by NOX SOUNDS https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/nature-essentials-208...

- Wind Chimes sounds by InspectorJ : https://freesound.org/s/353194/
- Other wind chimes sounds from https://www.shockwave-sound.com/free-sound-effects/wind-chimes-sounds
